titles.title: ALERT Communities Act
Advancing Lifesaving Efforts with Rapid Test strips for Communities Act
ALERT Communities Act
A bill to require research with respect to fentanyl and xylazine test strips, to authorize the use of grant funds for such test strips, and for other purposes.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions.
